classes.actdesc: Enter into the practice of witchcraft.
classes.flavor: 'What is't you do?' 'A deed without a name'

classes.desc: Master of demons and demonic magic.
Master of demons and demonic magic.
classes.flavor: In the War of the Locks the Seven raged for Power Absolute, and Dhrune trembled in their wake.

classes.name: death lock
classes.desc: An unholy synthesis of wizardry and demonology.
classes.flavor: Narz, Bodias, Vezial. Even among the Archlocks, some names stood in abject terror.
Even the dead have their uses.

classes.desc: Extend your life with spare parts from the dead.
classes.flavor: Even the dead have their uses.

classes.desc: Drain corpses of their lingering life-force to prolong your bleak existence.

classes.name: vile necromancer
classes.desc: In every epoch, Death appoints her viceroy.
classes.flavor: The greys bowed their heads in fear.

spells.name: dark feast
spells.desc: Tear life force from everything nearby and consume it to recover your own.
Decreases the target's resistance to shadow magic.

spells.name: soulbind branding
spells.desc: Carve a set of soul-trapping runes into an enemy's flesh, to prevent their soul from escaping your grasp
spells.flavor: It shall be engraved upon your soul!

spells.name: embalming injection
spells.desc: Inject an enemy with embalming fluid to preserve the corpse for later.
spells.flavor: Gives an entirely new definition to "living dead".

spells.name: dark promptings
spells.desc: Malevolent voices whisper secrets to your mind.

spells.name: Summon Imps
spells.desc: Summon your patron's weakest servants to perish for you.

spells.name: Summon quasit
spells.desc: Summon one of your patron's servants to die for you.

spells.name: summon grimstalk
spells.desc: Summon one of your patron's servants to endure for you.

spells.name: summon demon
spells.desc: Summon one of your patron's servants to fight for you.

spells.name: Raise skeleton
spells.desc: Infuse a bunch of bones into a temporary pawn.
spells.extdesc: Unstable summon - It'll lose its health over time without additional infusions of deathly energy.

spells.name: Raise zombie
spells.desc: The corpse can be easily reanimated into a mindless but resilient ally.
spells.extdesc: Unstable summon - It'll lose its health over time without additional infusions of deathly energy.

spells.name: Animate Bone Golem
spells.desc: Bones gathered, fused, and empowered with dark magic. Surely this will create a formidable minion.

spells.name: Unleash Spectre
spells.desc: Release a vengeful soul into the battlefield.

spells.name: Invoke Lesser Lich
spells.desc: Assemble a vessel and an ample offering in exchange for a servant of Death.

spells.name: Manifest Ethereal reaper
spells.desc: Rend the veil of death to summon manifestation of Death itself

spells.name: bolster undead
spells.desc: Infuse your minions with a protective layer of death energy.

spells.name: Reanimate Undead
spells.desc: Once possessed with a power of unliving, remnants of your minions can be pushed back into action with just a pinch of additional energy.
spells.flavor: You had one job — staying undead. Was that too much to ask?

spells.name: Recall shade
spells.desc: Shade already bound to you can be brought back from Plane of Death with a much simpler means.

furniture.desc: A resting place for the dead.
A vast complex to lock away hazardous experiments, deadly creatures, and all those who displease you.

furniture.name: vivisection lab
furniture.desc: Cut open 'willing' participants to see what makes your undead tick. A tendon here, a ligament there.

furniture.name: display room
furniture.desc: A large room for nicknacks and baubles.

homes.name: tomb
homes.desc: A hideout in the midst of lots of convenient corpses. Perfect for your nefarious ways.

homes.name: necropolis
homes.desc: A grand inverted city secreted below the surface. The restless dead gather en masse in preparation for your grand design.
homes.flavor: The great Dalassa raised the first necropolis, in ages long past.

tasks.name: Pillage Graves
tasks.desc: Dig up old graves for magical reagents. These guys are like 300 years old, they won't mind.

tasks.name: vile experiment
tasks.desc: Experiment on dead or soon-to-be-dead subjects. This is not something a good wizard would do.

tasks.name: dissect cadaver
tasks.desc: Dissect a body for components. Only the best pieces will serve.

tasks.name: grind bones
tasks.desc: Grind bones into dust.

tasks.name: powderize skull
tasks.desc: Grind a skull into dust.

tasks.name: funerary rites
tasks.desc: Oversee the funerary rites of merchants and nobles.

tasks.name: vivisection practice
tasks.desc: Put your new torture expertise to practice and do some work pro malo publico.
tasks.flavor: Reedburgh is the kind of place no one will miss a few people off the streets.

tasks.name: examine corpses
tasks.desc: Honestly, you're getting bored here. Tamper with some corpses, see if anything interesting results from various fluids and magics.
tasks.flavor: Just make sure the cult in the Barrows never finds out you intend to poach their knowledge.

tasks.desc: Rip out of a piece of your soul and store it in a magic gem.

tasks.name: lich
tasks.desc: Obtain immortality by becoming a lich.

tasks.name: raise necropolis
tasks.desc: Raise an entire undead city and make history in your infamy.
tasks.extdesc: Unlocks a new home when completed.

tasks.name: black book of ages
tasks.desc: The vellum is black, containing forbidden secrets written in blood. Just looking at it causes pain.
tasks.flavor: 'What knowledge do you seek?' the voices asked Vezial. 'Everything.'

tasks.name: blood siphon
tasks.desc: Leech blood from a body to restore your health.

tasks.name: converse with a skull
tasks.desc: Use a human skull as a conversation companion.

tasks.name: demonic dictionary
tasks.desc: A compiliation of obscure demonic languages.

tasks.name: bag of demons
tasks.desc: You'll make your own bags, thank you.
tasks.flavor: The research costs a little more than you expected...

tasks.name: witch's sabbat
tasks.desc: A revelry of demons and witches.

tasks.name: trap soul
tasks.desc: Capture a soul within a spirit gem.

tasks.name: Grimoire of Demons
tasks.desc: Put together your insights on demons and ways of forcing them to do your bidding

tasks.name: interrogate fiends
tasks.desc: Conjure and bind fiends to demand answers about their ilk.
tasks.flavor: Does Hell exist? Does damnation? Is it the same place as the Nether? Do demons originate from the damned?

tasks.name: room displays
tasks.desc: Fill your display room with more baubles and nicknacks.
tasks.flavor: Stuffed crocodiles and glassware filled with bubbling green goo are integral to any self-respecting wizard.

upgrades.name: deep incisions
upgrades.desc: The safest place to store your precious gems is by your heart.

upgrades.name: model skeleton
upgrades.desc: Bones and string making a complex skeleton of a human.
upgrades.flavor: If only they had a body.

upgrades.name: taxidermy animals
upgrades.desc: Small animals stuffed, embalmed and ready for study or display.

upgrades.name: model body
upgrades.desc: Muscles, sinew and all the red and white bits needed to show how a body looks under the surface.

upgrades.name: skeletal charger
upgrades.desc: It neither breathes nor tires.

upgrades.name: animate model skeleton
upgrades.desc: Perpetual, if rudimentary, reanimation of your model skeleton.
upgrades.flavor: Not useful for much, but it's a start. Now what if I...

upgrades.name: bone collector
upgrades.desc: Create a gibbering ghoul to scavenge for bones.
upgrades.flavor: Don't ask where it finds them.

upgrades.name: morbid trinkets
upgrades.desc: You have an unhealthy preoccupation with the macabre.

upgrades.name: better siphon
upgrades.desc: allows you to extract life from corpses more efficiently.

upgrades.name: improved vats
upgrades.desc: make your vats more efficient.
Learn to perform life-force transfusions.

upgrades.name: energy Transfusion
upgrades.desc: Transfusions now draw magical energy from bodies.

upgrades.name: unholy specimens
upgrades.desc: Your somber collection grows.

upgrades.name: magic skull
upgrades.desc: An ordinary human skull, infused with necromantic magicks.

upgrades.name: graveyard columbarium
upgrades.desc: A building for cremated remains.

upgrades.name: graveyard landscaping
upgrades.desc: Redesign many areas of the graveyard to be more respectful to the dead.

upgrades.name: graveyard soul binding
upgrades.desc: Tie the dead souls forcefully to the graveyard area.

upgrades.name: rework dungeon
upgrades.desc: Add in new hidden passages and optimize the layout of your dungeon to make better use of its space.

upgrades.name: dungeon catacomb
upgrades.desc: Turn a room in your dungeon into a dedicated storage area for skeletons.

upgrades.name: dungeon treasure room
upgrades.desc: Turn one room in your dungeon into a well-secured vault.

upgrades.name: demonic pact
upgrades.desc: A deal with a demon, sealed in blood. The knowledge offered is worth twice the price.
upgrades.flavor: And they say the blood has to be yours.

upgrades.desc: Glassware for keeping herbs or powders.
upgrades.flavor: Fine set of glassware with matching lids.

upgrades.desc: Receptacle for dust.

upgrades.name: Plane of Demons
upgrades.desc: Irith. Gellmud. Vornith. They offer you knowledge beyond your imagination.
upgrades.flavor: All they ask for, is a single step.

upgrades.name: Plane of Death
upgrades.desc: You feel the connection to the plane of Death beyond the gate.
upgrades.flavor: And you can't be killed like most men.

potions.name: potion of eternal youth
potions.desc: Ensures the drinker never becomes old. For sale only.

potions.name: soulbind essence
potions.desc: A measure of this sickly green substance can significantly improve the effects of soul traps.

potions.name: vile concoction
potions.desc: What was theirs is now yours.

events.desc: Updating internals - players should not see this. Ensures existing T5/6 evil classes, or anyone with a phylactory, gets evil3.
Updating internals - players should not see this. Ensures existing T3/4 evil classes, or anyone with necromancy, gets evil2.

tags.note: Minions prefix comes from minions. mod

tags.name: Shade
tags.note: Minions prefix comes from minions. mod

monsters.name: Bone Golem
monsters.desc: Amalgamation of skulls and bones. Quite handy, and can take a lot of beating.

monsters.name: Spectre
monsters.desc: Restless soul, empowered to act upon its grudges

monsters.name: Lesser Lich
monsters.desc: Clinging to un-death through dark rituals, master of
monsters.flavor: I unlive to serve you, my Lord.

monsters.name: Ethereal Reaper
monsters.desc: Death manifested, guiding your foes to the afterlife
